title: Chapter 2572 - Chapter 2572: Chapter 2572-Surrounded
body:
Chapter 2572 - Chapter 2572: Chapter 2572-Surrounded

Chapter 2572: Chapter 2572-surrounded

The crystal balls in the two middle-aged men’s hands could clearly sense Lu Ming’s aura. As soon as they got close, they lit up.

Lu Ming’s face was gloomy as he flew at top speed. However, as time passed, the distance between him and the two middle-aged men was getting closer and closer.

“Brat, you won’t be able to escape…”

One of the burly men said ferociously, his aura overbearing.

The two middle-aged men were both at the second level of the void God Realm. If Lu Ming was in his normal state, he would not be a match for them. Therefore, Lu Ming kept triggering the battle formula as he flew.

BOOM!

There seemed to be an explosion in his body. The double combat power of the battle formula had been successfully activated.

Lu Ming did not take action immediately. Instead, he continued flying.

In the blink of an eye, both parties were far away from the city and flew into a forest.

Buzzzzzz!

All of a sudden, Lu Ming’s figure that was flying at high speed came to a halt.

Not only that, but he also charged at the two middle-aged men. A combat sword appeared in his hand and he slashed.

The two middle-aged men did not expect Lu Ming to suddenly stop running and charge at them instead. They could not stop in their tracks and rushed toward Lu Ming.

BOOM! BOOM!

The two middle-aged men also made their moves. They each launched a move. However, it had happened too suddenly, so they could only use 50% of their combat strength at most.

A second-tier void God could only exert 50% of his combat strength. He could not withstand Lu Ming’s full power at all.

Pfft!

One of the middle-aged men did not even have the chance to scream before he

was cut in half by Lu Ming’s sword.

“Not good…”

The other burly man retreated.

“Kill!”

Lu Ming wielded his combat sword and charged at the middle-aged man with cold killing intent.

The middle-aged man finally came to his senses. He took out a saber and slashed at Lu Ming.

Clang!

The sword and saber collided, causing a violent tremor. The middle-aged man’s figure was forced to retreat.

Lu Ming’s combat power was doubled after activating the battle formula. Although he was not a match for a third level virtual God-level martial artist, he had an absolute advantage over a second level virtual God-level martial artist.

After forcing the middle-aged man back with one move, Lu Ming continued to attack his opponent, launching a storm of attacks.

The middle-aged man’s roar was like thunder. Naturally, he was not willing to be killed, so he fought back with all his might.

Clang! Clang! Clang!

The two of them collided continuously. However, Lu Ming’s combat strength was ultimately stronger. The middle-aged man was no match for him. After more than ten moves, both his arms were shattered by the impact. He was sent flying backward and spat out blood.

Whoosh!

Lu Ming became one with his sword and charged forward, killing the middle-aged man.

“You’re looking for death!”

At this moment, two figures flew over from the direction of the city, exuding cold killing intent.

It was obvious that the commotion of the battle had alerted the other experts

of the yuanluo Palace.

Lu Ming’s face darkened. With a wave of his hand, he kept the storage rings of the two middle-aged men. Then, he turned into a ray of light and flew away at high speed.

The two people who came later were very powerful. One of them was at the second level of the void God Realm, while the other had a terrifying aura and had reached the third level of the void God Realm.

This was not the heaven realm. Lu Ming could mobilize the power of the heaven realm’s primordial realm and the evil god Realm. Here, Lu Ming was definitely not a match for a third level void God Realm expert.

Lu Ming flew at top speed, with two people in hot pursuit behind him. These two people also looked middle-aged. One of them was a burly man with a single horn on his head, while the other was a human with loose hair. The human’s cultivation was at the third level of the void God Realm.

The two sides, one chasing and one fleeing, flew tens of thousands of miles in the blink of an eye.

Buzzzzzz!

At this moment, a figure suddenly dashed out from a mountain peak in front of Lu Ming. It was a burly elder who was holding a crystal ball in his hand.

At this moment, the crystal ball was flashing and reflecting light. “Hahaha, you’ve really worn out your iron shoes in a long search, but you found it without any effort!”

The burly old man laughed and threw a punch at Lu Ming.

A terrifying fist force came crushing toward Lu Ming.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The fist force had yet to arrive, but it brought with it a terrifying wave that pressed down on Lu Ming, making him hold his breath.

Lu Ming exerted all his strength and slashed with his sword.

“Buzz…”

The combat sword and the fist force collided. The combat sword shook violently. Lu Ming felt a violent force surging towards him. He could not help but retreat backward, his qi and blood churning.

third level void God Realm is indeed powerful!

Lu Ming steadied his body, his expression grave.

With his current combat strength, he couldn’t deal with a third level void God Realm existence.

Unless his cultivation base broke through to the three-star heavenly Emperor realm and the battle formula doubled his combat power, he would not be able to compete with a third level void God Realm expert.

The moment Lu Ming stopped, the two people behind him caught up and surrounded him.

Two of them were at the third level of the void God Realm, and one was at the second level of the void God Realm.

“Hehe, kid, let’s see how you’re going to escape this time.”

The one-horned man sneered.

Lu Ming frowned. He was no match for the two third level void God-level powerhouses. He was about to use Kang long to threaten them. With Kang long in his hands, he did not believe that the other party would dare to make a move.

“Kill!”

However, at this moment, the burly man with messy hair made his move. He was very decisive. A long spear appeared in his hand. A terrifying spear radiance shot out with a terrifying whistling sound and pierced towards Lu Ming.

He did not give Lu Ming any chance to react. Lu Ming could only wave his sword to block.

Clang!

The combat sword and the long spear collided and Lu Ming retreated rapidly.

“Kill!”

“Kill!”

The burly elder and the one-horned man also made their moves and charged toward Lu Ming.

The old man’s fist force was astonishing. He was wearing a pair of gloves on his hands, which were clearly divine artifacts. Every punch was terrifying.

Lu Ming tried his best to block a few moves. His body was in great pain as if it was about to split open.

However, just as Lu Ming was at a complete disadvantage, a sudden change occurred.

The man with messy hair suddenly changed the direction of his spear. He was no longer attacking Lu Ming but the burly elder instead.

The burly old man had never thought that the other party would suddenly attack him. He had not been prepared at all.

Pfft!

The long spear pierced through the old man’s forehead and the old man died. This scene not only stunned Lu Ming but also the one-horned burly man. Then, he roared,” “Song mo, what are you doing?”

“Kill!”

The reply to the horned man was the disheveled-haired man’s cold shout. He took advantage of the situation and pulled out his long spear, sweeping it across and hitting the horned man.

The horned man screamed as his body was split into two.

-Go down and find the answer yourself!”

The big man with messy hair said coldly. Then, he thrust his spear again and killed the one-horned man.

It happened so suddenly that the burly elder and the horned man were killed by the burly man with messy hair in an instant.

Lu Ming retreated and was on guard.

He was very curious as to why the other party would suddenly kill each other. The burly man with disheveled hair looked at Lu Ming with a complicated look in his eyes. He seemed to be reminiscing about the past.. After a moment of silence, he said,”You’re from the heaven realm, right?”
